title: ATP Appoints New Chief Financial Officer - Yahoo Finance
content: ATP Appoints New Chief Financial Officer  Yahoo Finance
description: ATP, a leading provider of software and technology for the aviation industry, hires Drew Plisco as CFOSan Francisco, California, May 02, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ATP, a leading provider of information services and software solutions for the aviation industry, announced today that Drew Plisco, a seasoned financial executive, has joined the company's leadership team as Chief Financial Officer. Plisco brings 15 years of diverse finance experience in both building and scaling large and mid-size orga
